post:
Are you looking for a storage VPS located in the UK on a high quality network with free month backups? This might be the answer!

This line of VPS hosting is running out of AS62240 in Enfield London, on servers with E3-1270 v5 CPU's, DDR4 RAM and brand new hard drives as well as fully redundant networking and power.

**Some other bits you might be interested in**

* Native IPv6, request extra for FREE!
* Internal networking on request
* 24/7 staffed support, 4-12 hours ticket response time
* Free weekly on-site backups
* Redundant power and networking
* Automatic IPv4 and IPv6 rDNS from SolusVM

**Extra IP's are $12 a year with justification - [Read TOS before ordering](https://dedistation.com/TOS.html) (No virtual currency, Tor, utilising 100% CPU or Hitleap without asking). Copyright abuse will be forwarded and followed up on.**

**Outgoing email is rate limited, these plans are NOT designed for sending mass mailing.**

> [UK Storage VPS 100 - $12 semi-annually - Click here to sign up](https://dedistation.com/billing/order.php?step=1&productGroup=15&product=31)
> ============
> * **2GB** DDR4 RAM
> * **100GB** Disk Space
> * Free Monthly Backups
> * **1** CPU Core on E3v5
> * **1TB** Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
> * 1 IPv4, 5 IPv6 with automatic rDNS
> * **London, UK** Datacenter
> * SolusVM Control Panel

---

> [UK Storage VPS 250 - $4 Monthly - Click here to sign up](https://dedistation.com/billing/order.php?step=1&productGroup=15&product=32)
> ============
> * **3GB** DDR4 RAM
> * **250GB** Disk Space
> * Free Monthly Backups
> * **2** CPU Core on E3v5
> * **2TB** Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
> * 1 IPv4, 5 IPv6 with automatic rDNS
> * **London, UK** Datacenter
> * SolusVM Control Panel

---

> [UK Storage VPS 350 - $7 Monthly - Click here to sign up](https://dedistation.com/billing/order.php?step=1&productGroup=15&product=33)
> ============
> * **4GB** DDR4 RAM
> * **350GB** Disk Space
> * Free Monthly Backups
> * **4** CPU Core on E3v5
> * **4TB** Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
> * 1 IPv4, 5 IPv6 with automatic rDNS
> * **London, UK** Datacenter
> * SolusVM Control Panel

As always thank you for taking the time to read this offer, and please PM me or open a ticket with any questions!

Please send a PM on LET for test IPv4/6 and files to download, or whois AS62240.
